page.title: 10Entertainment in Sedlescombe
page.content:
There is no commercially provided entertainment in the Sedlescombe area except television and radio. The nearest theatres and cinemas are in Hastings, Bexhill and Eastbourne.
The residents of the two villages are able to receive the four main T.V. channels. Besides the national radio programmes the villages also receive Radio Sussex with its articles of local interest. The 'Village Diarist' has a regular feature on this station.
The community is very resourceful at creating its own entertainment and there are many clubs and societies, some of which regularly put on shows for anyone interested.
